title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. I don't understand what this message means.
OB: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection, an error message is displayed: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection, I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Select a binary project, e.g. org.apache.ant.
2. Hit F4.
